title: 129th Ohio General Assembly
data: Husted resigned to become Ohio Secretary of State . Lehner appointed for remainder of term
Buehrer resigned to become director of the Ohio Bureau of Worker 's Compensation . Hite appointed for remainder of term
Gibbs resigned after winning an election to become a United States Congressman . Obhof appointed for remainder of term
Resigned May 23 , 2011 to become senior vice chancellor within a division of the Ohio Board of Regents . Coley appointed for remainder of term
Stewart resigned to work as president of the Ohio Gas Association . Balderson appointed for remainder of term
Resigned July 13 , 2011 to become chair of the Ohio Industrial Commission . Burke appointed for remainder of term
Grendell resigned to take a judiciary position . Eklund appointed for remainder of term
Wilson resigned to become a member of the Governor 's cabinet . Gentile appointed for remainder of term
Daniels resigned to become a member of the Governor 's cabinet . Peterson appointed for remainder of term
intro: The One Hundred Twenty-ninth Ohio General Assembly was a meeting of the Ohio state legislature, composed of the Ohio State Senate and the Ohio House of Representatives. It met in Columbus, Ohio from January 3, 2011 until December 20, 2012. While Ted Strickland was Ohio Governor for the first week of the biennium, John Kasich was sworn in during the second week. The apportionment of districts was based on the 2000 United States Census. This was the last time the 2000 census was used by the General Assembly to determine the apportionment of legislative districts. While the Ohio Senate was retained by the Ohio Republican Party, they won control of the Ohio House of Representatives from the Ohio Democratic Party.
